constraints.name: state_transition
constraints.description: 每个机器人在接收到命令后，其速度会被重置为新的值，并且以该速度匀速移动
constraints.formal: v_i(t) = x_i, if t >= t_command; v_i(t) = 0, otherwise

constraints.name: ordering
constraints.description: 事件按时间顺序给出，即 t_1 <= t_2 <= ... <= t_m
constraints.formal: t_i <= t_{i+1} for all i in [1, m-1]

constraints.name: operation_limit
constraints.description: 每个 `command` 操作只影响一个特定的机器人，不同的机器人之间互不影响
constraints.formal: command(k_i, x_i) affects only robot k_i

constraints.name: query_constraint
constraints.description: 对于每个 `query` 询问，需要输出当前离原点最远的机器人距离
constraints.formal: query(t) -> max(|a_i + v_i * (t - t_last_command)|) for all i in [1, n]
